entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Indian Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 12:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 5:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 5:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
